<<Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="3*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <TextBox x:Name="TitleListBox" IsReadOnly="True" Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="4" FontSize="20" Margin="5" Padding="20" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> <StackPanel Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="1"> <TextBox x:Name="TextBoxWithData" Margin="5" Padding="10" /> <ListView x:Name="ListBoxWithData" Margin="5" Padding="70" SelectionChanged="ListBoxWithData_OnSelectionChanged"> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <StackPanel> <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=DataInfo.Data}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="1"> <Button x:Name="AddButton" Content="Add" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="AddButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="SeriesButton" Content="Series" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="SeriesButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="DeleteButton" Content="Delete" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="DeleteButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="DrawButton" Content="Draw" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="DrawButtonOnClick" /> </StackPanel> <Canvas x:Name="MainCanvas" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="1" Margin="5" Height="260" Background="White"/> </Grid>.../>
